TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StopRoutingHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Web.Routing.IRouteHandler

summary.span: Provides a way to specify that ASP.NET routing should not handle requests for a URL pattern.

span.span: Provides a way to specify that ASP.NET routing should not handle requests for a URL pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您指定 ASP.NET 路由應該不會處理特定的 URL 要求。The class enables you to specify that ASP.NET routing should not handle certain URL requests. 您無法從處理特定要求所定義路由，以及指定的路由類別應該用來處理該路由的模式。You prevent routing from handling certain requests by defining a route and specifying that the class should be used to handle that route's pattern. 當要求由處理物件物件封鎖要求的路由為任何其他處理。When a request is handled by a object, the object blocks any additional processing of the request as a route. 相反地，為 ASP.NET 網頁、 Web 服務或其他 ASP.NET 的端點處理要求。Instead, the request is processed as an ASP.NET page, Web service, or other ASP.NET endpoint. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何防止路由處理.axd 要求的要求。The following example shows how to prevent routing from handling requests for .axd requests. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.StopRoutingHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.StopRoutingHandler/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.StopRoutingHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.StopRoutingHandler/vb/Global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
